trans-unit.source: Represents an access control entry (ACE).
trans-unit.target: Representerer en access control oppføring (TILGANGSKONTROLLISTEN).

trans-unit.source: The CommonAce class represents the eight most common ACE types: - <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> - <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> - <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> - <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> - <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> - <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> - <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> - <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>
trans-unit.target: Klassen CommonAce representerer åtte vanligste TILGANGSKONTROLLISTEN typene:- <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>- <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>- <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>- <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>- <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>- <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>- <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>- <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType></xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceType>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Flags that specify information about the inheritance, inheritance propagation, and auditing conditions for the new access control entry (ACE).
trans-unit.target: Flaggene som angir informasjon om arvingen arv overføring og overvåking betingelser for den nye access control oppføringen (TILGANGSKONTROLLISTEN).

trans-unit.source: The use of the new ACE.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av ny TILGANGSKONTROLLISTEN.

trans-unit.source: The access mask for the ACE.
trans-unit.target: Tilgangsmaske for TILGANGSKONTROLLISTEN.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> associated with the new ACE.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref> knyttet til nye TILGANGSKONTROLLISTEN.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify that the new ACE is a callback type ACE.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi at nye TILGANGSKONTROLLISTEN er en tilbakeringing TILGANGSKONTROLLISTEN.

trans-unit.source: Opaque data associated with the new ACE.
trans-unit.target: Ugjennomsiktig data som er forbundet med nye TILGANGSKONTROLLISTEN.

trans-unit.source: Opaque data is allowed only for callback ACE types.
trans-unit.target: Ugjennomsiktig data er bare tillatt for tilbakeringing TILGANGSKONTROLLISTEN typer.

trans-unit.source: The length of this array must not be greater than the return value of the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce.MaxOpaqueLength*> method.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på denne matrisen må være større enn verdien som returneres av den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce.MaxOpaqueLength*>metoden.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce.MaxOpaqueLength*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the length, in bytes, of the binary representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter lengden, i byte for den binære representasjonen av gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use this length with the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce.GetBinaryForm*> method before marshaling the ACL into a binary array.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne lengden med den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce.GetBinaryForm*>metoden før formidling Tilgangskontrollisten til en binær matrise.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce.GetBinaryForm*>

trans-unit.source: The length, in bytes, of the binary representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på den binære representasjonen av gjeldende, i byte <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Marshals the contents of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"></xref> object into the specified byte array beginning at the specified offset.
trans-unit.target: Marshals innholdet i den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"> </xref> -objektet til den angitt byte matrise med starten fra den angitte forskyvningen.

trans-unit.source: The byte array into which the contents of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"></xref> object is marshaled.
trans-unit.target: Bytematrise som innholdet i den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"> </xref> objektet formidles.

trans-unit.source: The offset at which to start marshaling.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvningen der du vil starte formidling.

trans-unit.source: offset is negative or too high to allow the entire to be copied into the binaryForm array.
trans-unit.target: offseter negativ eller for stor til at hele som skal kopieres til den binaryForm matrise.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum allowed length of an opaque data BLOB for callback access control entries (ACEs).
trans-unit.target: Henter den maksimale tillatte lengden på en ugjennomsiktig BLOB-data for tilbakeringing tilgangskontrolloppføringer (tilgangskontrolloppføringer).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify that the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"></xref> object is a callback ACE type.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Angi at den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce"> </xref> objektet er en tilbakeringing TILGANGSKONTROLLISTEN type.

trans-unit.source: The allowed length of an opaque data BLOB.
trans-unit.target: Den tillatte lengden på en ugjennomsiktig BLOB-data.
